00037 #include "egs_library.h"
00038 #include "egs_functions.h"
00039 
00040 #ifdef WIN32
00041 
00042 #include <windows.h>
00043 
00044 #define DLL_HANDLE HMODULE
00045 #define LOAD_LIBRARY(fname) LoadLibrary(fname)
00046 #define FREE_LIBRARY(lib)   FreeLibrary(lib);
00047 #define RESOLVE_SYMBOL(lib,symb) (void *) GetProcAddress(lib,symb)
00048 
00049 #else
00050 
00051 #include <dlfcn.h>
00052 
00053 #define DLL_HANDLE void*
00054 #define LOAD_LIBRARY(fname) dlopen(fname,RTLD_LAZY)
00055 #define FREE_LIBRARY(lib)   !dlclose(lib)
00056 #define RESOLVE_SYMBOL(lib,symb) dlsym(lib,symb)
00057 
00058 #endif
00059 
00060 #include <string>
00061 
00062 using namespace std;
00063 
00064 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00065 
00069 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_PrivateLibrary {
00070 public:
00071   DLL_HANDLE lib;
00072   string name, fname; bool au;
00073   EGS_PrivateLibrary(const char *lib_name, const char *path = 0);
00074   ~EGS_PrivateLibrary();
00075   bool load();
00076   void *resolve(const char *symb);
00077   bool unload();
00078   static char fs;
00079   static const char *lib_prefix;
00080   static const char *lib_suffix;
00081 };
00082 
00083 #ifdef WIN32
00084 #ifdef CYGWIN
00085 char EGS_PrivateLibrary::fs = '/';
00086 #else
00087 char EGS_PrivateLibrary::fs = '\\';
00088 #endif
00089 const char *EGS_PrivateLibrary::lib_prefix = "";
00090 const char *EGS_PrivateLibrary::lib_suffix = ".dll";
00091 #else
00092 char EGS_PrivateLibrary::fs = '/';
00093 const char *EGS_PrivateLibrary::lib_prefix = "lib";
00094 const char *EGS_PrivateLibrary::lib_suffix = ".so";
00095 #endif
00096 
00097 
00098 EGS_PrivateLibrary::EGS_PrivateLibrary(const char *lib_name, const char *path) {
00099   au = true; lib = 0;
00100   if( !lib_name ) {
00101       egsWarning("EGS_Library::EGS_Library: null library name?\n");
00102       return;
00103   }
00104   name = lib_name;
00105   if(path) {
00106       fname = path;
00107       if( fname[fname.size()-1] != fs ) fname += fs;
00108   }
00109   fname += lib_prefix;  fname += lib_name; fname += lib_suffix;
00110 #ifdef LIB_DEBUG
00111   egsInformation("EGS_Library::EGS_Library: file name is <%s>\n",fname.c_str());
00112 #endif
00113 }
00114 
00115 EGS_PrivateLibrary::~EGS_PrivateLibrary() {
00116     if( au ) unload();
00117 }
00118 
00119 bool EGS_PrivateLibrary::load() {
00120   if( lib  ) return true;
00121   lib = LOAD_LIBRARY(fname.c_str());
00122   /*
00123   if (!lib ) {
00124     const char *tmp = dlerror(); egsWarning("load library: %s\n",tmp);
00125   }
00126   */
00127 #ifdef DLL_DEBUG
00128   egsInformation("In EGS_PrivateLibrary::load(): name = %s lib = 0x%x\n",
00129           name.c_str(),lib);
00130 #endif
00131   if( lib ) return true;
00132   else {
00133       egsWarning("EGS_Library::load(): failed to load library %s\n",
00134               fname.c_str());
00135 #ifdef WIN32
00136       egsWarning("  error was: %d\n",GetLastError());
00137 #else
00138       egsWarning("  error was: %s\n",dlerror());
00139 #endif
00140       return false;
00141   }
00142 }
00143 
00144 void *EGS_PrivateLibrary::resolve(const char *symb) {
00145   if( !lib ) { if( !load() ) return 0; }
00146   void *result = RESOLVE_SYMBOL(lib,symb);
00147 #ifdef DLL_DEBUG
00148   egsInformation("In EGS_PrivateLibrary::resolve: symbol = %s result = 0x%x\n",
00149           symb,result);
00150 #endif
00151   return result;
00152 }
00153 
00154 bool EGS_PrivateLibrary::unload() {
00155     if( !lib ) return true;
00156     bool result = FREE_LIBRARY(lib);
00157     if( result ) lib = 0;
00158     return result;
00159 }
00160 #endif
00161 
00162 EGS_Library::EGS_Library(const char *lib_name, const char *path) {
00163     pl = new EGS_PrivateLibrary(lib_name,path);
00164 }
00165 
00166 EGS_Library::~EGS_Library() { delete pl; }
00167 
00168 bool EGS_Library::load() { return pl->load(); }
00169 
00170 void *EGS_Library::resolve(const char *symb) { return pl->resolve(symb); }
00171 
00172 bool EGS_Library::unload() { return pl->unload(); }
00173 
00174 bool EGS_Library::isLoaded() const { return (bool) pl->lib; }
00175 
00176 bool EGS_Library::autoUnload() const { return pl->au; }
00177 
00178 void EGS_Library::setUnload(bool u) { pl->au = u; }
00179 
00180 const char *EGS_Library::libraryName() const { return pl->name.c_str(); }
00181 
00182 const char *EGS_Library::libraryFile() const { return pl->fname.c_str(); }
00183 
00184 void *EGS_Library::resolve(const char *lname, const char *func,
00185         const char *path) {
00186     EGS_PrivateLibrary p(lname,path); p.au = false;
00187     if( !p.load() ) return 0;
00188     return p.resolve(func);
00189 }
